@graph.caption: Our Chickpea Tahini Saladi n a Sandwich on wood board

@graph.name: Chickpea Tahini Salad Sandwich - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Chickpea Tahini Salad Sandwich. Summery, refreshing Chickpea Salad with pecans, celery, onion, tahini and shawarma spice! Vegan Soyfree Recipe. Can be made nut-free Gluten-free

@graph.name: Chickpea Tahini Salad Sandwich
@graph.description: Amazing Chickpea Tahini Salad Sandwich. Summery, crunchy and refreshing Chickpea Salad with pecans, celery, onion, tahini and shawarma spice! Serve in lettuce wraps or sandwiches. Vegan Soyfree Recipe. Can be made nut-free Gluten-free
recipeIngredient: 15 oz chickpeas (rinsed and drained, or 1.5 cups cooked)
zest and juice of half a lime
sliced tomatoes (juicy tomatoes are best to add moisture to the sandwich)
Bread Slices for sandwich or lettuce for lettuce wraps

recipeInstructions.text: Add chickpeas and tahini to a large bowl. Mash with a potato masher and mix in. Add 1-2 tbsp water if needed for mashing.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chickpeas and tahini to a large bowl. Mash with a potato masher and mix in. Add 1-2 tbsp water if needed for mashing.

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the pecans on a skillet over medium heat for 3 to 4 mins. Add to the bowl. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast the pecans on a skillet over medium heat for 3 to 4 mins. Add to the bowl. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust the flavor with salt, lime juice, herbs (add parsley or dill). Add a few tbsp of water if needed to adjust consistency(moisture content varies in chickpeas and tahini). Chill (optional) for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust the flavor with salt, lime juice, herbs (add parsley or dill). Add a few tbsp of water if needed to adjust consistency(moisture content varies in chickpeas and tahini). Chill (optional) for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the breads if needed. Then layer greens, the chickpea salad, sliced onion or tomato.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast the breads if needed. Then layer greens, the chickpea salad, sliced onion or tomato.

recipeInstructions.text: For additional moisture, spread some hummus on the breads or other dressings of choice.To Store: Refrigerate just the chickpea salad in a covered container for upto 3 days.For Nut-free: Use toasted sunflower seedsFor Gluten-free: Serve the salad without bread or in lettuce cups.
recipeInstructions.name: For additional moisture, spread some hummus on the breads or other dressings of choice.To Store: Refrigerate just the chickpea salad in a covered container for upto 3 days.For Nut-free: Use toasted sunflower seedsFor Gluten-free: Serve the salad without bread or in lettuce cups.

@graph.keywords: chickpea salad sandwich, chickpea tahini salad sandwich
